text: Youtaijiaotu he jidu jiao tu dou shuo:`Women shi zhenzhu de erzi, shi ta xin'ai de ren.'Ni shuo:`Ta weishenme yaoyin nimen de zuiguo er chengzhi nimen ne?'Qishi, nimen shi tasuo chuangzao de ren. Ta yao she you shui, jiu she you shui; yao chengfa shui, jiu chengfa shui. Tiandi wanwu de guo quan, zhishi zhenzhu de; ta shi zuihou de guisu.
